overview: Porn legend Rocco Siffredi returns with the 28th installment of his notorious Animal Trainer series. Combining hard anal perversions and whimsical setups, Rocco: Animal Trainer 28 features a gorgeous female cast of European creatures, training with insatiable Siffredi team studs like Omar Galanti and Zenza Raggi. The sex is wall-to-wall and the girls (including classically beautiful brunette Playful Anne, stunning redhead Betty Saint and naturally jugsy Stella Fox) are incredible! Fans of hot women and rough buttfucking fun will not be disappointed.
title: Rocco: Animal Trainer 28
